attributes.action: Greedy gas/energy company directors should be made to go the funeral of anyone whose died of hypothermia at home
attributes.additional_details:
Gas and electricity company profits are increasing every year, even though most people are already struggling to pay their bill anyway.
There should be no place for this kind of greed in a 'civilised country' such as the UK.

This is why I think owners/company directors of the relevant supplying energy company should be made to go the funerals of people who have frozen to death in their own homes as the energy company is clearly responsible and should be made to realise the effects that their disgusting greed is having on real people.
